item.title: Apache Hive : My understanding, walkthrough a request
item.description: It’s been two months now that I’ve started my first job as a Data Engineer. My daily work involves interactions with Hadoop’s HDFS, Hbase and Hive. I’ve got to say that it is an exciting period ! I’m learning tons of new stuff. Anyway, let’s dive in Hive ! What’s Hive ? Used on top of file systems (HDFS, S3,..) Hive allows you to do data warehousing. You can create databases and tables that you can request as in other databases.
